com.intel.device.impl.phone.voice

Class AudioCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.device.impl.phone.voice.AudioCapture

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class AudioCapture
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to manage audio buffer capture and distribution. This class assumes that the audio consumers are interested in voice, not general audio. This class creates an AudioRecord object using the Android VOICE_RECOGNITION specification which should automatically apply noise suppression and acoustic echo cancellation pre-processing technologies to minimize environmental and device output noise within the audio stream. This class also provides the signal level (as calculated by RMS) to registered listeners.
